author: tibmeister
body: Seems that the Test-Connection camdlet is missing. Is this going to be implemented in the future?  If not I do have a wrapper I made to handle this.

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body:
Test-Connection is present in the Windows build of the 6.0.0-alpha.11 release. Please file an issue if you encounter a bug when using it.

If you are asking about Test-Connection for non-Windows platforms, it has not yet been ported and is an open task for someone to pick up.

comments.author: tibmeister
comments.body: Definitely thinking other platforms.  I will see if I can work on something for this.

title: Test-Connection Missing
